items.headline: GM becomes the latest carmaker to write down billions in pivot away from EVs
items.summary_en: General Motors warns of yet another EV-related writedown, less than a month after rival Ford Motor announced its own multibillion-dollar charges related to fading demand for EVs.

items.headline: Stocks face their first real test of 2026 with Friday’s pivotal jobs report and possible tariff ruling
items.summary_en: Markets are off to a strong start in 2025 — but investors could face their first real test on Friday with the December jobs report and, potentially, a Supreme Court decision on the legality of most of President Trump’s tariffs.
